sent.orig: An inmate at a massive Miami prison complex is stabbed to death in the prison yard.
sent.trans: 监狱内有囚犯被杀，原来一切都只是囚犯越狱的烟幕。

sent.orig: Prison a prison ahe was found guilty.
sent.trans: 罪犯一被发现有罪就被打入了监狱。

sent.orig: Shandong provincial prison policemen are part of the prison policemen and they have special professional characteristic.
sent.trans: 山东省省属监狱警察作为监狱警察的组成部分，存在特殊的职业特点。

sent.orig: Prison culture construction is a new topic in the deepening process of prison work reforms.
sent.trans: 监区文化建设是监狱工作改革深化过程中的一个新课题。

sent.orig: It is very important to make clear goal of prison enterprises in prison reform period.
sent.trans: 在监狱企业处于变革尚未定型的改革时期，明确监狱企业的目标非常重要。
